article_title: 5 major challenges that incoming Kentucky Gov. Matt Bevin faces
article_text:
Bevin claims he faces financial mess, but outgoing Gov. Steve Beshear touts surplus

Public pensions and health care present financial headaches for Bevin

Bevin must find way to work with House speaker and new attorney general

article_metadata.title: 5 major challenges that incoming Kentucky Gov. Matt Bevin faces | McClatchy DC

og.description: After a day of celebration Tuesday on becoming Kentucky’s 62nd governor, Republican Matt Bevin faces the stark reality of governing a challenged state.
